text: 6.16 Hos 10.8, Luk 23.30, Lep 4.2, 4.10, 9.6 We gɨl, kɨli kab awl ayɨp dum awl ayɨp kɨlop agɨlak, Bɨ bɨnonɨm besɨg mɨdeb yek ak chɨnop ma nɨgonɨmuŋ agɨlak. Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak chɨnop yul awl ma ñonɨmuŋ agɨlak. Anɨb ak tek yonɨgun tek ma lup agɨlak. Pɨg juwɨl pag apɨl, chɨnop pɨsnep yu gɨl we gɨnɨmuŋ agɨlak.
